column4: seem acer's page for your computer is at http://support.acer.com/acerpanam/desktop/0000/Acer/AspireSA60/AspireSA60sp2.shtml i have no idea what a VGA slot is, i'm guessing they meant AGP?
VGA is a port, not a slot - that page is just wrong...
i won't recommend nvidia (non-free driver), BUT i'd recommend against ATI (also non-free)
nvidia over ati was my point ;)
you're getting a bit offtopic with that question ;)
